text: maybe the more concrete question is: I have a template that uses `dnd_column`, `dnd_row` and `dnd_module` .. how do I replace those with alternatives that allow me to use hubdb in their place (specifically it seems like dnd_row does not allow me to directly nest a `{% if.. %}` and rather expects a `dnd_module` making it hard to use HubDB data in place of CMS (rich) text fields.

I am using a ForeignID column and it seems like I cannot set it up with a composite key (ie. in my case name + language), so I am using the `id` .. however it would be nice to at least get more information in the drop down when making the reference and not just the `id` .. I guess there is nothing I can setup to make it happen, right?
